name: meta-confirm
description: meta-confirm was intended to allow a simple way to test or confirm the existence of specific meta tag and description on a web page

scripts.coveragebackup: ISTANBUL_REPORTERS=text-summary,html istanbul instrument test --recursive --output ./lcov.info && istanbul cover **.js
scripts.prepublish: npm install jshint --global # also runs npm run prebuild
scripts.prebuild: npm run test # also runs npm run pretest

author: Mike Caspar <mike@caspar.com> (http://www.caspar.com)
